title: RDS Instance Health
content: Create a PQL program that monitors the health of all RDS instances across regions, focusing on CPU and memory usage over the past 7 days.

title: ELB Traffic Analysis
content: Create a PQL program to analyze traffic patterns and peak hours for Elastic Load Balancers across all regions for the past 15 days.

title: Lambda Invocation Count
content: Create a PQL program that tracks the invocation count and errors for Lambda functions across all regions for the last 7 days.

title: DynamoDB Capacity Usage
content: Create a PQL program to analyze provisioned vs. consumed read/write capacity for DynamoDB tables across all regions over the past 30 days.

title: EC2 Cost Analysis
content: Create a PQL program to calculate and summarize EC2 cost across all instance types and regions over the past 60 days.

title: VPC Traffic Monitoring
content: Create a PQL program to monitor inbound and outbound traffic for all VPCs, identifying high-traffic patterns over the past month.

title: S3 Access Logs
content: Create a PQL program to analyze S3 access logs and identify frequent access patterns and potential security issues over the past 30 days.

title: CloudFront Usage Report
content: Create a PQL program that generates usage and cost reports for CloudFront distributions over the last 15 days, including request and data transfer stats.

title: ECS Cluster Performance
content: Create a PQL program to track ECS cluster performance metrics, including CPU and memory utilization for each service and task over the past week.

title: ElastiCache Memory Analysis
content: Create a PQL program to analyze memory usage and hit/miss rates for ElastiCache clusters across all regions for the last 30 days.
